review: I own two of these.  One is in my living room, and the other is in my bedroom.  It is very easy to pick and choose which TV to watch your program on.  I really like that my smartphone has replaced my remote control.  I am no longer looking in seat cushions to change the channel. I docked 1 star because of the software.  It can act buggy sometimes.  Minor things like adjusting volume on my smartphone cannot be done because the  TV volume adjusts instead.  1 gripe is directed at you Amazon.  I have an amazon prime membership but cannot cast your video player to my Chromecast.  It's really pathetic that you intentionally avoid allowing this so you can sell your fire stick.  Instead of that, I may stop subscribing to prime because of your very obvious deceptive tactics.  You're going to shoot yourself in the foot.  Stop trying to be greedy.  Sorry for the rant.

review: Have 3 in my house, one on each TV.  Perfect for taking my program with me when changing rooms since it's no trouble to switch the output to a new TV from my phone, iPad, etc.  A good add-on for this is one of the small 4-in.
